Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Neither vWf nor vWf propolypeptide ( von Willebrand antigen II ) were detectable in plasma , platelets , or endothelial cells of the homozygous mutant mice .

Let's think step by step.

1. vWf (von Willebrand factor) - a protein involved in the coagulation process and named as a disease entity in this context as it was not detectable in the homozygous mutant mice.
2. vWf propolypeptide (von Willebrand antigen II) - a precursor form of vWf and also identified as a disease entity since it was not detectable in the plasma, platelets, or endothelial cells of the homozygous mutant mice.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

1. vWf deficiency (or von Willebrand disease) - a condition characterized by the absence or reduced levels of von Willebrand factor in the body, as indicated by the undetectable presence of both vWf and vWf propolypeptide in the homozygous mutant mice.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| vWf deficiency (or von Willebrand disease) |
